-e ---

𒌝 UM ≈ 𒋰𒋰𒐈 ≈ 𐎶 M/MA

𒌝 UM ≈ 𒈩 mesa ≈ table 𒁾

𒌝 ˠUM ᵠUM MA < MES 𒈩 Mesa ⋍ Table 𒁾 TUB ≠ 𒍫

𒌝 ˠUM < ᵍUM < ᶜUM in 𒌝𒋫𒁲 ᶜum-ta-di کمتر kamtar "less, minute, minuse"

𒌝 ˠUM < ˢUM in 𒌝𒈠𒌅 ˠum-ma-tu soma™ "main body" 𓄥

𒌝 ʰUM in human 𒌝𒈠𒀭 ʰum-ma-an "crewmen, workmen"

𒌝 ≈ 𓅓 90° 🦉

𒌝 -um -on superfluous Akkadian suffix see UM manner ment -com

𒌝 -um diminuative? <> 𒌝𒋫𒁲 diminish

𒌝 ᶜum ≈ come in

𒁾 tehi 𒌝 tehi₂ 𒋼𒄷 ṭe-ḫu #ţehûⁿ 𓏏 𓎡 𓈖 𓂻 tĕkaⁿ 𒋼 teĝ₃ 𒋾 teĝ₄ доаѓа doaǵa near (verb and adjective)

𒌝 dih₂ دَاء dāʔ tehi < die ≈ 𒌅 tur₅ "disease" <> …դություն doenza dolentia doleō √delh₁ Teil व्याधि tauti tetã 𐍃𐌰𐌿𐌷𐍄𐍃

𒁾 tehi/dih₂ <> 𒌝𒋫𒁲 ᶜum-ta-di کمتر kamtar "less, minute, minuse"

UM 𒌝 Akkadian transparent noun suffix
-𒌝 -um ⇔ -on -ma -𒈨 me @ Elamite (pendulum)

UM 𒌝 Akkadian singular noun marker

𒌝𒈨 eme₂ Amme (wet nurse) 𒌝𒈨 ᵍeme₂ 𒊩𒆳 GEME₂ γᾰμος gyne 𒌝𒈠 pheme "say thus" 𓅓 𓂝 𓎡 ( بومة būma 𓅓 ) 𒌝𒈠 woman ⇔ gymna
𒌝𒈠 umma Amme : mother
𒌝𒈠 mot 𒀀𒆳 ᵠamat

𒎘 ≈ 𒌝𒈨 eme2 |UM.ME| Amme "wet nurse" Akk. mušēniqtu 𒌝𒈨 |UM.ME| Amme "wet nurse" Akk. mušēniqtu /eme2/ 𒌝𒈨 Amme, mother /emeda/ 𒌝𒈨 Amme, mother /ummeda/ 𒌝𒈨𒁕 Amme, mother /emedada/ 𒌝𒈨𒁕 Amme, mother /ummedada/ 𒌞 Amme, mother /emeda3/ 𒌟 Amme, mother /emeda3/ 𒌼𒈨𒁕 Amme, mother /emeda/

𒌝𒈠 Oma : old lady ⇔ Dame
𒌝𒈠 Omm : "Mark my speech" …

𒌝 -um -I'm me pronoun suffix?
𒈾 𒅆 𒆪 𒌝 na-ši-ku-um ich-schenke

𒌝 ˠUM ᵠUM > HUM in 𒁹𒌝 𒌋 𒌋𒀠𒁕𒀀𒊺 ᵐum-man-al-da-a-še Ummanaldašu = Ḫumban-ḫaltaš II

𒌑 ⋍ 𒋢𒌝 ⋍ 𒋗 in
𒌑𒋗 šam-šu sun 𒊓𒄠𒋢𒌝 śa-am-śu-um /śamśum/ 𒌓

𒌝𒋫𒁲 um-ta-di ¬much менш mancul mazāk minus 𐌼𐌹𐌽𐍃 mjenš moins 𒌝𒋫𒁲 umⁿta-di ≈ minute <> diminish 𒌝 -um diminuative? 𒌝𒋫𒁲 ᶜum-ta-di کمتر kamtar 𒌝𒋫𒁲 less !
